trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: Save-Help
trans-unit.target: Save-Help

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Downloads and saves the newest help files to a file system directory.
trans-unit.target: 下載最新的說明檔並儲存至檔案系統目錄。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Save-Help** cmdlet downloads the newest help files for Windows PowerShell modules and saves them to a directory that you specify.
trans-unit.target: **Save-help** cmdlet 會下載最新說明檔案 Windows PowerShell 模組，並將它們儲存到您指定的目錄。

trans-unit.source: This feature lets you update the help files on computers that do not have access to the Internet, and makes it easier to update the help files on multiple computers.
trans-unit.target: 此功能可讓您在無法存取網際網路的電腦上更新說明檔案，並輕鬆地在多部電腦上更新說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 3.0, **Save-Help** worked only for modules that are installed on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中， **Save-help** 只適用於本機電腦安裝的模組。

trans-unit.source: Although it was possible to import a module from a remote computer, or obtain a reference to a **PSModuleInfo** object from a remote computer by using Windows PowerShell remoting, the **HelpInfoUri** property was not preserved, and **Save-Help** would not work for remote module Help.
trans-unit.target: 雖然可以匯入模組，從遠端電腦，或取得參考 **PSModuleInfo** 物件，從遠端電腦使用 Windows PowerShell 遠端 **HelpInfoUri** 屬性不會保留，以及 **Save-help** 卻不適用於遠端模組說明。

trans-unit.source: In Windows PowerShell 4.0, the **HelpInfoUri** property is preserved over Windows PowerShell remoting, which enables **Save-Help** to work for modules that are installed on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows PowerShell 4.0 中， **HelpInfoUri** 屬性會保留透過 Windows PowerShell 遠端功能，可讓 **Save-help** 適用於在遠端電腦安裝的模組。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to save a **PSModuleInfo** object to disk or removable media by running Export-Clixml on a computer that does not have Internet access, import the object on a computer that does have Internet access, and then run **Save-Help** on the **PSModuleInfo** object.
trans-unit.target: 您也可儲存 **PSModuleInfo** 到磁碟或卸除式媒體的電腦上執行 Export-clixml，沒有網際網路存取，匯入的電腦沒有網際網路存取，並接著執行物件的物件 **Save-help** 上 **PSModuleInfo** 物件。

trans-unit.source: The saved help can be transported to the remote computer by using removable storage media, such as a USB drive.
trans-unit.target: 已儲存的說明可以傳輸到遠端電腦，使用卸除式存放媒體，例如 USB 磁碟機。

trans-unit.source: The help can be installed on the remote computer by running **Update-Help**.
trans-unit.target: 說明可以安裝在遠端電腦上執行 **Update-help**。

trans-unit.source: This process can be used to install help on computers that do not have any kind of network access.
trans-unit.target: 此程序可用來在沒有任何存取網路方式的電腦上安裝說明。

trans-unit.source: To install saved help files, run the Update-Help cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝已儲存的說明檔案，請執行 Update-help 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: Add its *SourcePath* parameter to specify the folder in which you saved the Help files.
trans-unit.target: 加入其 *SourcePath* 參數來指定您儲存說明檔案的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Without parameters, a **Save-Help** command downloads the newest help for all modules in the session and for modules that are installed on the computer in a location listed in the **PSModulePath** environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有參數， **Save-help** 命令會下載最新的說明工作階段中的所有模組以及在位置中列出電腦所安裝的模組 **PSModulePath** 環境變數。

trans-unit.source: This action skips modules that do not support Updatable Help without warning.
trans-unit.target: 這個動作會略過模組不支援可更新的說明而不發出警告。

trans-unit.source: The **Save-Help** cmdlet checks the version of any help files in the destination folder.
trans-unit.target: **Save-help** 指令程式會檢查目的地資料夾中任何說明檔的版本。

trans-unit.source: If newer help files are available, this cmldet downloads the newest help files from the Internet, and then saves them in the folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果可用的較新的說明檔，此 cmdlet 會從網際網路下載最新說明檔案，然後將它們儲存在資料夾中。

trans-unit.source: The **Save-Help** cmdlet works just like the Update-Help cmdlet, except that it saves the downloaded cabinet (.cab) files, instead of extracting the help files from the cabinet files and installing them on the computer.
trans-unit.target: **Save-help** cmdlet 的運作方式就像 Update-help 指令程式不同之處在於它會將儲存下載的封包 (.cab) 檔案，而不是從封包檔解壓縮說明檔案，並在電腦上安裝它們。

trans-unit.source: The saved help for each module consists of one help information (HelpInfo XML) file and one cabinet (.cab) file for the help files each UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 每個模組的已儲存說明都包含說明資訊 (HelpInfo XML) 檔案和包含每個 UI 文化特性說明檔案的封包 (.cab) 檔。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to extract the help files from the cabinet file.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有從封包檔解壓縮說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: The **Update-Help** cmdlet extracts the help files, validates the XML for safety, and then installs the help files and the help information file in a language-specific subfolder of the module folder.
trans-unit.target: **Update-help** 指令程式會解壓縮說明檔案、 驗證基於安全考量，XML，然後模組資料夾的特定語言子資料夾中安裝說明檔案與說明資訊檔案。

trans-unit.source: To save the help files for modules in the Windows PowerShell installation folder ($pshome\Modules), start Windows PowerShell by using the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要將模組的說明檔儲存在 Windows PowerShell 安裝資料夾 ($pshome\Modules) 中，啟動 Windows PowerShell 使用系統管理員身分執行。

trans-unit.source: You must be a member of the Administrators group on the computer to download the help files for these modules.
trans-unit.target: 您必須為電腦上 Administrators 群組的成員才能下載這些模組的說明檔。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet was introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引進。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Save the help for the DhcpServer module
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 儲存 DhcpServer 模組的說明

trans-unit.source: This example shows three different ways to use **Save-Help** to save the help for the **DhcpServer** module from an Internet-connected client computer, without installing the **DhcpServer** module or the DHCP Server role on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此範例將示範三種不同方式使用 **Save-help** 儲存的說明 **DhcpServer** 模組無法連線到網際網路的用戶端電腦，而不需要安裝 **DhcpServer** 模組或本機電腦上的 DHCP 伺服器角色。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Install help for the DhcpServer module
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 安裝 DhcpServer 模組的說明

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to install help that you saved in Example 1 for the **DhcpServer** module on a computer that does not have Internet access.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何安裝範例 1 中儲存的說明 **DhcpServer** 沒有網際網路存取的電腦上的模組。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Save help for all modules
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 儲存所有模組的說明

trans-unit.source: This command downloads the newest help files for all modules in the UI culture set for Windows on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會根據為本機電腦上 Windows 設定的 UI 文化特性下載所有模組的最新說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: It saves the help files in the \\\\Server01\Fileshare01 folder.
trans-unit.target: 它會將儲存中的說明檔 \\\\Server01\Fileshare01 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Save help for a module on the computer
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 在電腦上儲存的模組說明

trans-unit.source: This command downloads the newest help files for the **ServerManager** module, and then saves them in the \\\\Server01\Fileshare01 folder.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會下載最新說明檔案 **ServerManager** 模組，然後將它們在儲存 \\\\Server01\Fileshare01 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: When a module is installed on the computer, you can type the module name as the value of the *Module* parameter, even if the module is not imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 在電腦上安裝模組時，您可以輸入模組名稱當做值 *模組* 參數，即使模組未匯入目前的工作階段。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the *Credential* parameter to supply the credentials of a user who has permission to write to the file share.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *認證* 參數來提供具有寫入至檔案共用的權限的使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Save help for a module on a different computer
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 在不同電腦上儲存的模組說明

trans-unit.source: These commands download the newest help files for the **CustomSQL** module and save them in the \\\\Server01\Fileshare01 folder.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令會下載最新說明檔案 **CustomSQL** 模組，並儲存在 \\\\Server01\Fileshare01 資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Because the **CustomSQL** module is not installed on the computer, the sequence includes an Invoke-Command command that gets the module object for the CustomSQL module from the Server02 computer and then pipes the module object to the **Save-Help** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 因為 **CustomSQL** 模組未安裝在電腦上，該順序包含 Invoke-command 命令從 Server02 電腦取得 CustomSQL 模組的模組物件，然後將模組物件輸送到 **Save-help** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: When a module is not installed on the computer, **Save-Help** needs the module object, which includes information about the location of the newest help files.
trans-unit.target: 在電腦上未安裝模組時 **Save-help** 需要模組物件，其中包含最新說明檔案的位置相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Save help for a module in multiple languages
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 儲存多種語言的模組說明

trans-unit.source: This command saves help for the Windows PowerShell Core modules in four different UI cultures.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會為 Windows PowerShell 核心模組儲存四種不同 UI 文化特性的說明。

trans-unit.source: The language packs for these locales do not have to be installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要安裝在電腦上沒有這些地區設定的語言套件。

trans-unit.source: **Save-Help** can download help files for modules in different UI cultures only when the module owner makes the translated files available on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: **Save-help** 模組擁有者提供翻譯的檔案在網際網路上時，才可以下載不同 UI 文化特性中的模組說明檔。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Save help more than one time each day
trans-unit.target: 範例 7︰ 儲存說明一次以上每一天

trans-unit.source: This command saves help for all modules that are installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會為安裝在電腦上所有的模組儲存說明。

trans-unit.source: The command specifies the *Force* parameter to override the rule that prevents the **Save-Help** cmdlet from downloading help more than once in each 24-hour period.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會指定 *Force* 參數來覆寫規則，可防止 **Save-help** cmdlet 下載說明超過一次在每 24 小時期間內。

trans-unit.source: The *Force* parameter also overrides the 1 GB restriction and circumvents version checking.
trans-unit.target: *Force* 參數也會覆寫 1 GB 的限制和規避版本檢查。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you can download files even if the version is not later than the version in the destination folder.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您可以下載檔案，即使版本不晚於目的地資料夾中的版本。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the **Save-Help** cmdlet to download and save the help files to the specified folder.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 **Save-help** cmdlet 下載並儲存說明檔案至指定的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: The *Force* parameter is required when you have to run a **Save-Help** command more than one time each day.
trans-unit.target: *Force* 參數是必要的當您必須執行 **Save-help** 命令一次以上每一天。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user credential.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用者認證。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet runs the command by using credentials of a user who has permission to access the file system location specified by the *DestinationPath* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 會使用有權存取所指定的檔案系統位置之使用者的認證來執行命令 *DestinationPath* 參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when the *DestinationPath* or *LiteralPath* parameter is used in the command.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數是時才有效 *DestinationPath* 或 *LiteralPath* 命令中使用參數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter enables you to run **Save-Help** commands that use the *DestinationPath* parameter on remote computers.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數可讓您執行 **Save-help** 命令使用 *DestinationPath* 在遠端電腦上的參數。

trans-unit.source: By providing explicit credentials, you can run the command on a remote computer and access a file share on a third computer without encountering an access denied error or using CredSSP authentication to delegate credentials.
trans-unit.target: 由提供明確的認證，您可以執行此命令在遠端電腦上存取檔案共用的第三個電腦上，而不會發生 「 拒絕存取 」 錯誤，或使用 CredSSP 驗證來委派認證。

trans-unit.source: -DestinationPath
trans-unit.target: -DestinationPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path of the folder in which the help files are saved.
trans-unit.target: 指定在其中儲存的說明檔的資料夾路徑。

trans-unit.source: Do not specify a file name or file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 不要指定檔案名稱或副檔名。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet does not follow the once-per-day limitation, skips version checking, and downloads files that exceed the 1 GB limit.
trans-unit.target: 指出此 cmdlet 不遵循每一天一次的限制、 略過版本檢查，以及下載超過 1 GB 限制的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Without this parameter, only one **Save-Help** command for each module is permitted in each 24-hour period, downloads are limited to 1 GB of uncompressed content per module, and help files for a module are installed only when they are newer than the files on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有這個參數，只有一個 **Save-help** 命令會在每 24 小時期間內允許每個模組、 下載項目僅限於 1 GB 的未壓縮的內容，每個模組，和模組的說明檔已安裝的時候才比電腦上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The once-per-day limit protects the servers that host the help files, and makes it practical for you to add a **Save-Help** command to your Windows PowerShell profile.
trans-unit.target: 每天一次的限制保護裝載說明檔的伺服器，也可讓您新增 **Save-help** 命令到您的 Windows PowerShell 設定檔。

trans-unit.source: To save help for a module in multiple UI cultures without the *Force* parameter, include all UI cultures in the same command, such as:
trans-unit.target: 若要儲存多重 UI 文化特性，而不需要的模組說明 *Force* 參數，在相同命令中，包含所有 UI 文化特性，例如︰

trans-unit.source: -FullyQualifiedModule
trans-unit.target: -FullyQualifiedModule

trans-unit.source: Specifies modules with names that are specified in the form of ModuleSpecification objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定的模組使用 ModuleSpecification 物件形式指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is described in the Remarks section of Module Specification Constructor (Hashtable)http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290(v=vs.85).aspx (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290(v=vs.85).aspx) on the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN).
trans-unit.target: 這 < 備註 > 一節所述的模組規格建構函式 (Hashtable) http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290 (vs.85 (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/jj136290 (vs.85) Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the *FullyQualifiedModule* parameter accepts a module name that is specified in the format @{ModuleName = "modulename"; ModuleVersion = "version_number"} or @{ModuleName = "modulename"; ModuleVersion = "version_number"; Guid = "GUID"}.
trans-unit.target: 例如， *FullyQualifiedModule* 參數可接受的格式指定的模組名稱 @{ModuleName ="modulename";ModuleVersion ="version_number"} 或 @{ModuleName ="modulename";ModuleVersion ="version_number";Guid ="GUID"}。

trans-unit.source: **ModuleName** and **ModuleVersion** are required, but **Guid** is optional.
trans-unit.target: **ModuleName** 和 **ModuleVersion** 是必要的但 **Guid** 是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: You cannot specify the *FullyQualifiedModule* parameter in the same command as a *Module* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 您不能指定 *FullyQualifiedModule* 中一樣的命令參數 *模組* 參數。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path of the destination folder.
trans-unit.target: 指定目的地資料夾的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the value of the *DestinationPath* parameter, the value of the *LiteralPath* parameter is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 值不同 *DestinationPath* 參數、 值 *LiteralPath* 完全依照其輸入，使用參數。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -Module
trans-unit.target: 模組

trans-unit.source: Specifies modules for which this cmdlet downloads help.
trans-unit.target: 指定這個指令程式會下載說明模組。

trans-unit.source: Enter one or more module names or name patters in a comma-separated list or in a file that has one module name on each line.
trans-unit.target: 以逗號分隔的清單或在每一行有一個模組名稱的檔案，請輸入一個或多個模組名稱或名稱模式。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe module objects from the Get-Module cmdlet to **Save-Help**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用管線從 Get-module cmdlet 的模組物件 **Save-help**。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Save-Help** downloads help for all modules that support Updatable Help and are installed on the local computer in a location listed in the **PSModulePath** environment variable.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Save-help** 下載支援可更新的說明和列中的位置中的本機電腦上安裝所有模組的說明 **PSModulePath** 環境變數。

trans-unit.source: To save help for modules that are not installed on the computer, run a **Get-Module** command on a remote computer.
trans-unit.target: 若要儲存在電腦未安裝的模組的說明，請執行 **Get-module** 命令在遠端電腦上。

trans-unit.source: Then pipe the resulting module objects to the **Save-Help** cmdlet or submit the module objects as the value of the *Module* or *InputObject* parameters.
trans-unit.target: 然後使用管線傳送要產生的模組物件 **Save-help** cmdlet 或提交模組物件的值為 *模組* 或 *InputObject* 參數。

trans-unit.source: If the module that you specify is installed on the computer, you can enter the module name or a module object.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的模組已安裝在電腦上，您可以輸入模組名稱或模組物件。

trans-unit.source: If the module is not installed on the computer, you must enter a module object, such as one returned by the **Get-Module** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 如果在電腦上未安裝此模組，您必須輸入模組物件，例如由 **Get-module** 指令程式。

trans-unit.source: The *Module* parameter of the **Save-Help** cmdlet does not accept the full path of a module file or module manifest file.
trans-unit.target: *模組* 參數 **Save-help** cmdlet 不接受模組檔案或模組資訊清單檔案的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: To save help for a module that is not in a **PSModulePath** location, import the module into the current session before you run the **Save-Help** command.
trans-unit.target: 若要儲存之模組的不是在說明 **PSModulePath** 位置，將模組匯入目前的工作階段，然後再執行 **Save-help** 命令。

trans-unit.source: A value of "*" (all) attempts to update help for all modules that are installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 值為"*"（全部） 嘗試進行更新安裝在電腦的所有模組的都說明。

trans-unit.source: This includes modules that do not support Updatable Help.
trans-unit.target: 這包括不支援 Updatable Help 的模組。

trans-unit.source: This value might generate errors when the command encounters modules that do not support Updatable Help.
trans-unit.target: 當命令遇到不支援 Updatable Help 的模組時，這個值可能會產生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -UICulture
trans-unit.target: -UICulture

trans-unit.source: Specifies UI culture values for which this cmdlet gets updated help files.
trans-unit.target: 指定 UI 文化特性值，此 cmdlet 會取得已更新說明檔。

trans-unit.source: Enter one or more language codes, such as es-ES, a variable that contains culture objects, or a command that gets culture objects, such as a Get-Culture or Get-UICulture command.
trans-unit.target: 輸入一或多個語言代碼，例如 ES-ES、 包含文化特性物件的變數或可取得文化特性物件的命令，例如 Get 文化特性或 Get-uiculture 命令。

trans-unit.source: Wildcard characters are not permitted.
trans-unit.target: 不允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: Do not specify a partial language code, such as "de".
trans-unit.target: 請勿指定完整的語言代碼，例如"de"。

trans-unit.source: By default, **Save-Help** gets help files in the UI culture set for Windows or its fallback culture.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設， **Save-help** 取得說明適用於 Windows 或其後援文化特性設定的 UI 文化特性中的檔案。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the *UICulture* parameter, **Save-Help** looks for help only for the specified UI culture, not in any fallback culture.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定 *UICulture* 參數， **Save-help** 會尋找指定的 UI 文化特性，不在任何後援的文化特性的說明。

trans-unit.source: -UseDefaultCredentials
trans-unit.target: -UseDefaultCredentials

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this cmdlet runs the command, including the web download, with the credentials of the current user.
trans-unit.target: 表示此指令程式會執行命令，包括從 web 下載，目前使用者的認證。

trans-unit.source: By default, the command runs without explicit credentials.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，該命令執行時不會使用明確宣告的認證。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is effective only when the web download uses NTLM, negotiate, or Kerberos-based authentication.
trans-unit.target: 此參數只在網路下載是使用 NTLM、交涉或 Kerberos 驗證時有效。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSModuleInfo
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSModuleInfo

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a module object from the **Get-Module** cmdlet to the *Module* parameter of **Save-Help**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線將模組物件從 **Get-module** cmdlet *模組* 參數 **Save-help**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 Cmdlet 不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: To save help for modules in the $pshome\Modules folder, start Windows PowerShell by using the Run as administrator option.
trans-unit.target: 若要儲存在 $pshome\Modules 資料夾中的模組的說明，請啟動 Windows PowerShell 使用系統管理員身分執行。

trans-unit.source: Only members of the Administrators group on the computer can download help for modules in the $pshome\Modules folder.
trans-unit.target: 只有在電腦上的 Administrators 群組的成員可以下載模組在 $pshome\Modules 資料夾中的說明。

trans-unit.source: The saved help for each module consists of one help information (HelpInfo XML) file and one cabinet (.cab) file for the help files each UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 每個模組的已儲存說明都包含說明資訊 (HelpInfo XML) 檔案和包含每個 UI 文化特性說明檔案的封包 (.cab) 檔。

trans-unit.source: You do not have to extract the help files from the cabinet file.
trans-unit.target: 您沒有從封包檔解壓縮說明檔案。

trans-unit.source: The Update-Help cmdlet extracts the help files, validates the XML, and then installs the help files and the help information file in a language-specific subfolder of the module folder.
trans-unit.target: Update-help 指令程式解壓縮說明檔案、 驗證 XML，並在語言特定資料夾的子模組安裝說明檔和說明資訊檔案。

trans-unit.source: The **Save-Help** cmdlet can save help for modules that are not installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: **Save-help** cmdlet 可以儲存在電腦未安裝的模組的說明。

trans-unit.source: However, because help files are installed in the module folder, the **Update-Help** cmdlet can install updated help file only for modules that are installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為說明檔已安裝在模組資料夾中， **Update-help** 指令程式可以安裝更新的說明檔只有在電腦安裝的模組。

trans-unit.source: If **Save-Help** cannot find updated help files for a module, or cannot find updated help files in the specified language, it continues silently without displaying an error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果 **Save-help** 找不到模組，已更新的說明檔，或找不到已更新的說明檔中指定的語言，它會繼續作業而不會顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: To see which files were saved by the command, specify the *Verbose* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看哪些檔案已儲存命令，請指定 *Verbose* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Modules are the smallest unit of updatable help.
trans-unit.target: 模組是可更新的說明之最小單位。

trans-unit.source: You cannot save help for a particular cmdlet, only for all cmdlets in module.
trans-unit.target: 您無法儲存特定的 cmdlet，只會針對所有模組中 cmdlet 的說明。

trans-unit.source: To find the module that contains a particular cmdlet, use the **ModuleName** property together with the Get-Command cmdlet, for example,
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找包含特定 cmdlet 的模組，請使用 **ModuleName** 屬性和 Get-command cmdlet，例如，

trans-unit.source: **Save-Help** supports all modules and the Windows PowerShell Core snap-ins.
trans-unit.target: **Save-help** 支援所有模組和 Windows PowerShell 核心嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: It does not support any other snap-ins.
trans-unit.target: 它不支援任何其他嵌入式管理單元。

trans-unit.source: The **Update-Help** and **Save-Help** cmdlets use the following ports to download help files: Port 80 for HTTP and port 443 for HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: **Update-help** 和 **Save-help** cmdlet 下載說明檔會使用下列連接埠︰ 連接埠 80 的 HTTP 和 https 連接埠 443。

trans-unit.source: The **Update-Help** and **Save-Help** cmdlets are not supported on Windows Preinstallation Environment (Windows PE).
trans-unit.target: **Update-help** 和 **Save-help** 指令程式不支援 Windows 預先安裝環境 (Windows PE)。

trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: 可更新的說明狀態資料表 (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=270007)

trans-unit.target: 取得文化特性

trans-unit.target: Get-Help

trans-unit.target: Get-Module
